mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bill_number AS "billNumber", a.customer_id AS "customerId", b.customer_name AS "customerName", b.membercard AS "memberCard", a.bill_time AS "billTime", a.attendance_id AS "attendanceId", a.is_paid AS "isPaid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN Crm_customer b on b.id=a.customer_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM f_bill a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND b.membercard LIKE '%'||#{memberCard}||'%' '%'+#{memberCard}+'%' concat('%',#{memberCard},'%')
AND b.customer_name LIKE '%'||#{customerName}||'%' '%'+#{customerName}+'%' concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
AND datediff(day, a.bill_time, #{billTime})=0 to_days(bill_time)=to_days(#{billTime})
AND bill_number LIKE '%'||#{billNumber}||'%' '%'+#{billNumber}+'%' concat('%',#{billNumber},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_bill( id, bill_number, customer_id, bill_time, attendance_id, is_paid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #billNumber, #{customerId}, #{billTime}, #{attendanceId}, #{isPaid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE f_bill SET bill_number = #{billNumber}, customer_id = #{customerId}, bill_time = #{billTime}, is_paid = #{isPaid}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
